events.message: The customer reported a vehicle accident that occurred on the highway causing rear-end damage to their car.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the initial description referencing a car collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to follow up and assist the claimant.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the accident claim and next steps.
Requested vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage to support the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including the accident police report and car damage images.
The claims investigation team began assessing the submitted materials and contacting the third-party involved.
Investigation concluded confirming the liability of the other driver and estimating repair costs for the claimant's vehicle.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer covering full repair expenses and rental car reimbursement.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the responsiveness of the claims team.
Claim officially approved by management following customer agreement on the settlement terms.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim file was closed after confirming that payment was received and repairs were authorized by the customer.
The resolved claim has been archived in the system for future reference and compliance requirements.
